scripts.ci:release:product: changeset version && git add . && git commit -m "chore: release stable version" && git tag -a v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") -m "v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" && git push --follow-tags
scripts.ci:release:staging: changeset pre enter rc && changeset version && git add . && git commit -m "chore: release rc version" && git tag -a v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")-rc -m "v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")-rc" && git push --follow-tags && changeset pre exit
scripts.ci:release:dev: changeset pre enter beta && changeset version && git add . && git commit -m "chore: release beta version" && git tag -a v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")-beta -m "v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")-beta" && git push --follow-tags && changeset pre exit
